title: Solr should not wrap TokenStreams in a caching filter when using usePhraseHighlighter=true
description: this is a very old limitation, so we should not do this anymore - this makes us pay a penalty for using the caching filter even when we do not need to and there are only basic term queries to highlight.

comments.author: Tomás Fernández Löbbe
comments.content: This issue is duplicated with SOLR-2453

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: Heh - you are right - an exact dupe. Wonder how that happened.
